name: Cats Cup
description:
Cats Cup is one of the most CREATIVE drawing line puzzle games for fun. All the levels are designed to activate your curiosities and creativeness. You should find the best way to draw one line and collect the cocktail to fill up the glass.


FEATURES:

• Best Physics Game by Drawing Lines to Fill the Glass
The cocktail liquid flows down naturally and it will change its path when meeting obstacles like the lines you draw.

• Cute Cats' Characters & Vivid Avatars
Different kinds of adorable cats' avatar will be shown when you pass or fail the gaming levels.

• Fresh New Cocktail Recipes for You to Unlock
You can learn the basic recipes for more than one hundred cocktails when you playing the game.

• Diversified Ways to Make Hundreds of Cocktails
Try to find ways as many as possible to draw the line and you may get the best solution to reach 3 stars.



HOW TO PLAY:

- Follow the tutorials to draw one line for each level.
- Use "Hints" for help when you get stuck.
- Invite friends to help solve one certain puzzle. ( * it will be added in upcoming versions )
- Use "Retry" to find a better solution and get more stars for each level.


CONTACT US
support@puzzlegames.freshdesk.com


Do you love cute cats? Do you like drinking cocktails? Are you good at physics puzzle games?
If your answer is "Yes" for all above these questions, you will definitely have great journeys of this Cats Cup line puzzle game. Try to enjoy it NOW!
